name: Panel: Autonomous Worlds as Ecosystem
description: What is the state of the Autonomous Worlds ecosystem today? And what lessons can be learned from hype cycles past as the plot of this ecosystem evolves and expands?

speakers.name: David Amor
speakers.bio: David Amor is the co-founder of onchain game studio Playmint and has worked on over 100 titles over the course of his 30-year career.

speakers.name: Hilmar Veigar Pétursson
speakers.bio: Hilmar Veigar Pétursson is CEO of CCP Games, the studio behind the pioneering MMORPG EVE Online.

speakers.name: Rafael Morado
speakers.bio: Rafael Morado heads product strategy at Lattice. Previously, he has built games at Dapper Labs, CCP Games, and Ubisoft.
